dialog.title: Dialog
dialog.subtitle: Modal dialog component for displaying content, forms and user interactions with fullscreen mode and customization support

basic.title: Basic Example
basic.description: Standard modal dialog with title, close button and main content. Controlled via `show` property

fullscreen.title: Fullscreen Mode
fullscreen.description: Dialog with fullscreen toggle. Enabled via `fullscreen` property, which adds a button in header to expand/collapse dialog

animation.title: Animations
animation.description: Dialog supports three appearance/disappearance animations: `fade`, `zoom`, `slide`. Controlled via `animation` property

nonModal.title: Non-modal Mode
nonModal.description: Dialog in non-modal mode (`modal: false`) does not block interaction with rest of page content and has no overlay

template.title: Header and Footer Template
template.description: Using `header` and `footer` slots to create structured content. `header` slot receives: `close` (close), `toggleFullscreen` (toggle fullscreen), `isFullscreen` (state), `fullscreenIcon` (icon)

size.title: Sizes
size.description: Dialog size is controlled via `width`, `maxWidth` and `maxHeight` properties. You can use numbers (pixels) or strings with units (e.g. "90vh", "90vw")

withoutHeader.title: Without Header
withoutHeader.description: Dialog without title and close button. Created by setting `title=""` and `showClose: false`

customIcons.title: Custom Icons
customIcons.description: Configure icons for dialog control buttons: `closeIcon` (close), `maximizeIcon` (expand), `minimizeIcon` (collapse). All icons must be Vue components

argTypes.width: Dialog width in pixels (number) or string with units
argTypes.maxHeight: Maximum dialog height (number in pixels or string with units, e.g. "90vh")
argTypes.maxWidth: Maximum dialog width (number in pixels or string with units, e.g. "90vw")
argTypes.fullscreen: Enables fullscreen toggle (shows button in header to expand/collapse)
argTypes.modal: Makes dialog modal (with darkened background, blocking interaction with rest of content)
argTypes.closeOnOverlayClick: Closes dialog when clicking on overlay
argTypes.closeOnEscape: Closes dialog when pressing Escape key
argTypes.lockScroll: Locks page scrolling when dialog is open
argTypes.teleportTo: Selector or element to which dialog is teleported (default "body", false - no teleport)
argTypes.zIndex: Z-index for dialog (used to control stacking order)
argTypes.title: Dialog title displayed in header (if header slot is not used)
argTypes.durationEnter: Duration of appearance animation in milliseconds
argTypes.durationLeave: Duration of disappearance animation in milliseconds
argTypes.animation: Type of appearance/disappearance animation: fade (fade), zoom (scaling), slide (slide)
argTypes.closeIcon: Vue component icon for close button (if not specified, default icon is used)
argTypes.maximizeIcon: Vue component icon for button that expands to fullscreen
argTypes.minimizeIcon: Vue component icon for button that collapses from fullscreen
argTypes.show: Event fired when dialog is shown
argTypes.hide: Event fired when dialog is hidden
argTypes.maximize: Event fired when dialog is expanded to fullscreen
argTypes.minimize: Event fired when dialog is collapsed from fullscreen
argTypes.overlayClick: Event fired when clicking on overlay
argTypes.escape: Event fired when Escape key is pressed
argTypes.header: Slot for custom header. Receives: close, toggleFullscreen, isFullscreen, fullscreenIcon
argTypes.footer: Slot for dialog footer (displayed at the bottom)
